templates.template:
<xf:if is="$xf.visitor.canChangeThreadIconPosition($forum.node_id)"> <xf:radiorow name="thread_icon_position" label="{{ phrase('icon_display_position') }}" value="{$thread.Icon.position}">
<xf:option value="before" label="{{ phrase('before_thread_title') }}" selected="{{ !$thread.Icon || $thread.Icon.position == 'before' }}" />
<xf:option value="after" label="{{ phrase('after_thread_title') }}" /> </xf:radiorow> </xf:if>

<xf:if is="$xf.visitor.canUseThreadIcon($forum.node_id)"> <xf:css src="dcThreadIcon.less" /> <xf:js src="DC/ThreadIcon/picker.js" />
<xf:textbox name="thread_icon" placeholder="{{ phrase('icon') }} " data-xf-init="tooltip" data-xf-click="thread-icon-picker" title="{{ phrase('thread_icon_picker') }}" class="js-thread-icon-picker input--thread-icon-picker" readonly="readonly" value="{{ $thread.Icon ? $thread.Icon.icon : '' }}"/> </xf:if>
